meanings.definition: A person who overcomes something, especially a difficult situation or challenge.
meanings.sent1: The overcomers in the race never gave up and finished strong.
meanings.sent2: The overcomers in the story inspired others with their determination.
meanings.sent3: The overcomers at the chess tournament celebrated their victory with a dance.
meanings.sent4: The overcomers in the movie fought against all odds to achieve their dreams.
meanings.sent5: The overcomers in the painting symbolized resilience and perseverance.

meanings.definition: Those who are victorious or successful in overcoming obstacles.
meanings.sent1: The team of overcomers celebrated their hard-earned victory.
meanings.sent2: The overcomers in the competition showed great strength and courage.
meanings.sent3: The group of overcomers at the party shared stories of their triumphs.
meanings.sent4: The overcomers in the play demonstrated resilience in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The community of overcomers supported each other through challenges.
